name: tree-sitter-sfapex
description: A tree-sitter grammer for Salesforce's Apex, SOQL, and SOSL

scripts.build: npm run build-generate && npm run build-wasm
scripts.build-generate: npm run build-apex && npm run build-soql && npm run build-sosl && npm run build-sflog
scripts.build-wasm: npm run build-apex-wasm && npm run build-soql-wasm && npm run build-sosl-wasm && npm run build-sflog-wasm
scripts.build-apex-wasm: cd apex && npx tree-sitter build --wasm && cp tree-sitter-apex.wasm ../docs/playground/js/ && cp tree-sitter-apex.wasm ../bindings/web/
scripts.build-soql-wasm: cd soql && npx tree-sitter build --wasm && cp tree-sitter-soql.wasm ../docs/playground/js/ && cp tree-sitter-soql.wasm ../bindings/web/
scripts.build-sosl-wasm: cd sosl && npx tree-sitter build --wasm && cp tree-sitter-sosl.wasm ../docs/playground/js/ && cp tree-sitter-sosl.wasm ../bindings/web/
scripts.build-sflog-wasm: cd sflog && npx tree-sitter build --wasm && cp tree-sitter-sflog.wasm ../docs/playground/js/ && cp tree-sitter-sflog.wasm ../bindings/web/
scripts.test-load: npm run test-load-rust && npm run test-load-node
scripts.test: npm run test-apex && npm run test-soql && npm run test-sosl && npm run test-sflog && npm run test-load
scripts.prebuildify-all: npm run prebuildify-mac && npm run prebuildify-windows
